pullrequest.title: Learn Gazebo Visual Plugins for Ocean Reflections

content.raw:
Great improvements! Here, you can find a nice dataset of images created from University of Florida during different events. Maybe you can use as a reference to adjust the intensity of reflection/refraction. 

[https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/](https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/)

From a quick inspection, I noticed that it should be more subtle than what I thought. Here’s an example:

[https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/navigator\_seecam\_hawaii\_2018\_12\_12/2018-12-12\_grinch\_attempt\_bag\_\_camera\_front\_right\_image\_raw1325465579948408161.png](https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/navigator_seecam_hawaii_2018_12_12/2018-12-12_grinch_attempt_bag__camera_front_right_image_raw1325465579948408161.png)
content.html:
Great improvements! Here, you can find a nice dataset of images created from University of Florida during different events. Maybe you can use as a reference to adjust the intensity of reflection/refraction.

https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/

From a quick inspection, I noticed that it should be more subtle than what I thought. Here’s an example:

https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/navigator_seecam_hawaii_2018_12_12/2018-12-12_grinch_attempt_bag__camera_front_right_image_raw1325465579948408161.png
